textBeforeTable: Kettering University designates the classification of students, regardless of the degree program being pursued, according to the total earned hours accumulated. textAfterTable: Note: The classification code, (FRI, FRII, SOI, SOII, JRI, JRII, SRI, SRII, and SRIII) whereby each major classification (Freshman, Sophomore, Junior, Senior) is subdivided into first and second semester levels, is for internal tracking of a student’s progress and estimation of the expected graduation date.
